WRITING.TEXT: [Meanwhile in Falconia](http://i.imgur.com/mzjuriG.png)

[He also was featured in several NASA documentaries that are readily available](https://youtu.be/bPMc2RQ--t0), many of them [focusing on the quest to discover alien life.](https://youtu.be/WtQZ_3FkASc?t=7)
[I know a path in the woods](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YgIaX_4mGew)
I've been checking back here like every hour just waiting for the leaks to appear lol

Well, i'm sure Miura wants some $$$ too lol. Spin off novels have become a common thing for popular manga and anime, the creator of Attack on Titan has made a mint off of spin off novels (that he allowed other people to write). At least with this, Miura has signifigant direct involement so it won't be that much of a bastardization of the story like some of the Attack on Titan spinoff garbage is lol

Well, what im getting at is that if he has 200 pages of ideas for the backstory of Grunbeld, incorporating it into the manga perhaps would be to much of a distraction to the main storyline to do. Perhaps he thought that he would have been cutting it too short if he included a smaller version of it in the manga. Who knows though, perhaps we'll see a abreviated version of it fleshed out in a future episode of the manga anways lol.

We also already have ~100-200 there that has been publicly revealed before, there are some 50 - 100 special forces actively advising Somali government commandos on raiding missions plus more training somali troops and likely some attaches operating in capital.

I imagine that there is a better chance of the novel getting translated than the supplemental materials. Its rather easy to market and sell novels these days with online distribution of written works, however things like guidebooks and artbooks are less readily distributable in electronic form in my opinion. There seems to be an increase lately in novel type works related to manga and anime being translated into english. For example, the first Record of Lodoss War novel is finally officially being translated into english. I imagine that if they are going really deep into Grunbeld's backstory via novel that it has little relevance towards the plot of the main storyline and that it is going to be so in depth that to incorporate it into the manga would be burdonsome. I could see him doing it via a spin-off manga, but the last time he worked on a different manga other than berserk, berserk went on hiatus lol
I mean, a manga of it would be great, but given how slow the regular Berserk is released, ill take anything i can get lol
Reading the article, it says it is co-written by Miura as well, so i imagine that it will be considered canon.

WRITING.TITLE: Cardinale Responds to Proposal by Chief Justice Rabner to Block ICE Agents from NJ Courthouses

WRITING.TEXT: They are fake indians. They are a group of people who live up in the Ramapo mountains and have been repeatedly denied federal recognition as an indian tribe. Virtually all of the Native Americans who lived in what is now new jersey were killed off or driven out of the area by the Dutch in colonial conflicts in the 1600's. The Federal government has repeatedly found no evidence to suggest that the people living in the Ramapo Mountains are in any manner related to the Lenape indians who had previously inhabited the area in Dutch times. Ther few Lenape's that were left in the western part state had sided with the French during the French and Indian War, they were given the Brotherton Reservation, [but they lived there for only 40 some odd years until they decided to move to New York and left the reservation in 1801.](https://books.google.com/books?id=_r9Ni6_u0JEC pg=PA102 dq=new+jersey+indian+reservation hl=en sa=X ved=0ahUKEwi6vJmoprbTAhUM1CYKHd1NBMMQ6AEIMzAD#v=onepage q=new%20jersey%20indian%20reservation f=false)

The [#berserk2016-anime-spoiler-free channel](https://discord.gg/0159ZDWk9yieVJQkj) is moderated for spoilers so new fans who aren't fully caught up with the manga can chat there with no worries about manga spoilers. Please be advised: other channels however do not moderate spoilers. Reminder: Crunchyroll is the officially licensed distributor for Berserk (2016). Please do not post or request alternate places to watch or download the episode as that would violate Rule #5 (no piracy)

**
Remember: If you disagree with someone, please do so respectfully. Do not insult others for having a different opinion.

WRITING.TITLE: TIL That From 1270 to 1356, Korea was ruled by the Yuan Dynasty, the Rulers of China During the Same Period

WRITING.TEXT: I think the old banner was better, there's barely any images of Gut's new party in this one. Farnese is practically absent.

While South Korea was never part of China, it was part of the Mongolia for around 90 years. In 1259 the Korean kingdom of Goryeo (which ruled the entire Korean peninsula) surrendered to the Mongolian Empire. It would remain a part of the empire until the 1350's when the Mongols were distracted by major rebellions in China.

Indeed, as i said before its surprising how effective the Vietnamese were at extracting information from American prisoners during the war there, but the Chinese were unable to do so effectively during the same time period.
